sqlMap.select: SELECT change_id,order_id, create_time,old_ticket_change_serial,new_ticket_change_serial, ticket_price_diff_change_serial,change_diff_money,change_refund_money,change_receive_money, book_ticket_time,fail_reason,train_no,change_train_no, from_time, change_from_time, travel_time,change_travel_time,from_city,to_city,out_ticket_billno,account_id, change_status,isasync,callbackurl,reqtoken,change_notify_status, change_notify_count, change_notify_time,change_notify_finish_time, from_station_code,to_station_code FROM elong_orderinfo_change WHERE reqtoken = #reqtoken:VARCHAR#
SELECT new_cp_id FROM elong_change_cp WHERE order_id = #orderId:VARCHAR#

SELECT cp_id, new_cp_id, order_id, change_id, CONCAT(buy_money, '') buy_money, CONCAT(change_buy_money, '') change_buy_money, seat_type, change_seat_type, ticket_type, train_box, change_train_box, seat_no, change_seat_no, ids_type, user_ids, user_name, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time, is_changed FROM elong_change_cp
cp_id = #cp_id:VARCHAR#
order_id = #order_id:VARCHAR#
change_id = #change_id:INTEGER#
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO elong_orderinfo_change
order_id,
isasync,
callbackurl,
reqtoken,
old_ticket_change_serial,
new_ticket_change_serial,
ticket_price_diff_change_serial,
change_diff_money,
change_refund_money,
change_receive_money,
book_ticket_time,
fail_reason,
train_no,
change_train_no,
from_time,
change_from_time,
travel_time,
change_travel_time,
from_city,
to_city,
out_ticket_billno,
account_id,
change_status,
change_notify_status,
change_notify_time,
change_notify_finish_time,
change_notify_count,
to_station_code,
from_station_code,
ischangeto,
merchant_id,
isChooseSeats,
chooseSeats,
create_time )
VALUES
#order_id:VARCHAR#,
#isasync:VARCHAR#,
#callbackurl:VARCHAR#,
#reqtoken:VARCHAR#,
#old_ticket_change_serial:VARCHAR#,
#new_ticket_change_serial:VARCHAR#,
#ticket_price_diff_change_serial:VARCHAR#,
#change_diff_money:DECIMAL#,
#change_refund_money:DECIMAL#,
#change_receive_money:DECIMAL#,
#book_ticket_time:DATETIME#,
#fail_reason:VARCHAR#,
#train_no:VARCHAR#,
#change_train_no:VARCHAR#,
#from_time:DATETIME#,
#change_from_time:DATETIME#,
#travel_time:DATETIME#,
#change_travel_time:DATETIME#,
#from_city:VARCHAR#,
#to_city:VARCHAR#,
#out_ticket_billno:VARCHAR#,
#account_id:VARCHAR#,
#change_status:VARCHAR#,
#change_notify_status:VARCHAR#,
#change_notify_time:DATETIME#,
#change_notify_finish_time:DATETIME#,
#change_notify_count:INTEGER#,
#to_station_code:VARCHAR#,
#from_station_code:VARCHAR#,
#ischangeto#,
#merchant_id#,
#isChooseSeats:TINYINT#,
#chooseSeats:VARCHAR#,
NOW() )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS change_id

INSERT INTO elong_change_cp
cp_id,
new_cp_id,
order_id,
change_id,
buy_money,
seat_type,
change_seat_type,
ticket_type,
train_box,
seat_no,
ids_type,
user_ids,
user_name,
is_changed,
create_time )
VALUES
#cp_id:VARCHAR#,
#new_cp_id:VARCHAR#,
#order_id:VARCHAR#,
#change_id:INTEGER#,
#buy_money:DECIMAL#,
#seat_type:VARCHAR#,
#change_seat_type:VARCHAR#,
#ticket_type:VARCHAR#,
#train_box:VARCHAR#,
#seat_no:VARCHAR#,
#ids_type:VARCHAR#,
#user_ids:VARCHAR#,
#user_name:VARCHAR#,
#is_changed:VARCHAR#,
NOW() )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE create_time = NOW()
,change_id = #change_id:INTEGER#
,change_seat_type = #change_seat_type:VARCHAR#
,is_changed = #is_changed:VARCHAR#
,new_cp_id = #new_cp_id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: SELECT change_id, order_id, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time, old_ticket_change_serial, new_ticket_change_serial, ticket_price_diff_change_serial, CONCAT(change_diff_money, '') change_diff_money, CONCAT(change_refund_money, '') change_refund_money, CONCAT(change_receive_money, '') change_receive_money, DATE_FORMAT(book_ticket_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') book_ticket_time, fail_reason, train_no, change_train_no, DATE_FORMAT(from_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') from_time, DATE_FORMAT(change_from_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') change_from_time, DATE_FORMAT(change_to_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') change_to_time, DATE_FORMAT(travel_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') travel_time, DATE_FORMAT(change_travel_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') change_travel_time, from_city, to_city, out_ticket_billno, account_id, change_status, isasync, callbackurl, reqtoken, change_notify_status, change_notify_count, DATE_FORMAT(change_notify_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') change_notify_time, DATE_FORMAT(change_notify_finish_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') change_notify_finish_time, zm1.lh from_station_code,zm2.lh to_station_code, DATE_FORMAT(pay_limit_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') pay_limit_time FROM elong_orderinfo_change left join t_zm zm1 on elong_orderinfo_change.from_city = zm1.zmhz left join t_zm zm2 on elong_orderinfo_change.to_city = zm2.zmhz WHERE (change_notify_status = '000' OR (change_notify_status = '111' AND change_notify_time <= DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 MINUTE))) AND change_notify_count < 5 AND change_status IN ('14','15','23','24','34','35') and merchant_id=#merchantId:VARCHAR# ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 0,15
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE elong_orderinfo_change
old_ticket_change_serial = #old_ticket_change_serial:VARCHAR#
new_ticket_change_serial = #new_ticket_change_serial:VARCHAR#
ticket_price_diff_change_serial = #ticket_price_diff_change_serial:VARCHAR#
change_diff_money = #change_diff_money:DECIMAL#
change_refund_money = #change_refund_money:DECIMAL#
change_receive_money = #change_receive_money:DECIMAL#
change_status = #change_status:VARCHAR#
callbackurl = #callbackurl:VARCHAR#
change_notify_status = #change_notify_status:VARCHAR#
change_notify_count = #change_notify_count:INTEGER#
change_notify_time = #change_notify_time:DATETIME#
change_notify_finish_time = #change_notify_finish_time:DATETIME#
fee = #fee:DECIMAL#
totalpricediff = #totalpricediff:DECIMAL#
diffrate = #diffrate:DECIMAL#
WHERE change_id = #change_id:INTEGER#
UPDATE elong_change_cp set is_changed = #is_changed:VARCHAR# WHERE cp_id = #cp_id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select:
select oc.change_from_time, oc.change_travel_time, cc.is_changed,cc.ticket_type, cc.change_buy_money,cc.user_ids,cc.user_name,cc.ids_type from elong_orderinfo_change oc,elong_change_cp cc where oc.change_id= cc.change_id
cc.new_cp_id = #new_cp_id:VARCHAR#
oc.order_id = #order_id:VARCHAR#
SELECT checi,name,arrtime,starttime,costday FROM t_sinfo WHERE checi =#checi:VARCHAR# AND name =#name:VARCHAR# LIMIT 1
